review_content: Cider at the sea. Sweet, red apples, sweet. And crisp. Once again_: quite artificial.

Kurzgesagt schmeckt wie apfelschorle mit Alkohol. Oder sagen wir so. Mehr apfelschorle als Apfelwein. 

Süß und sauer schmeckt nach Apfel. Hat Alkohol also passt
Another faceless commercial cider. Sweetish, sourness, notes of apple juice. high carbonation. sweet acidity in the aftertaste.
Artificially sweetened. way too much sugar. Too sweet. Sweetness is overwhelming everything else. Gold pour with average watery head that goes away quickly. Good carbonation on it.
# 1904; 3/2020. Arteficial green apple aroma. Gold, briliant body. Arteficial green apple flavor, crispy, honey. Sweet and arteficial cider. 0,3 l, bottle, market, Pilsen (Bohemia, CZ).
Bottle: Poured a carbonated bubble golden with white head that dissipate fast. Aroma is sweet apples. Taste is tooth decaying sweet apples.
Sporo było wypitego piwa swojego czasu. historyczna opinia i ocena z pamięci.
Pale golden body and no head. Sweet apple juice aroma. Low bitter and sour taste, sweet apple. fizzy carbonation. An average cider.
masterpiece. that's all. i can drink 6can of this amazing piece of art. this drink is not blong to the market. it should be at the fancy restaurant.
Can. Light golden color. Sweet aplles in aroma and taste with clove, cinnamon.
Drunk in Portugal, clear light yellow without a head, fresh but on the end heavy sweet, pour sugar,

Rami Rami is drinking a Somersby Apple Beer Drink by Carlsberg Polska at Przyłęk Duży

Nie dosc, ze jak aromat liquidu do efajkow (znow!), to do tego chyba jeszcze wiecej cukru. Mniej i tensywnosci. Nawet pijac jko Helene z alko nie broni sie niczym :(
W aromacie guma jabłkowa. W smaku słodkie, chemicznie jabłkowe, guma balonowa. Pijalność średnia, dość zamulające. Ogólnie nieco męczące
Clear yellow color without a head. Sweet apple juice aroma. Bitter and sour apple taste. Quite bad artificail taste.
0,33 l. Bottle from Interspar Zagreb. Yellow color. Apple juice aroma. Apple juice and sweet taste
Cider at the sea. Sweet, red apples, sweet. And crisp. Once again_: quite artificial.
Kurzgesagt schmeckt wie apfelschorle mit Alkohol. Oder sagen wir so. Mehr apfelschorle als Apfelwein.…
Another faceless commercial cider. Sweetish, sourness, notes of apple juice. high carbonation. sweet acidity in the aftertaste.
Artificially sweetened. way too much sugar. Too sweet. Sweetness is overwhelming everything else. Gold pour with average watery head that goes away quickly. Good carbonation on it.
# 1904; 3/2020. Arteficial green apple aroma. Gold, briliant body. Arteficial green apple flavor, crispy, honey. Sweet and arteficial cider. 0,3 l, bottle, market, Pilsen (Bohemia, CZ).
Bottle: Poured a carbonated bubble golden with white head that dissipate fast. Aroma is sweet apples. Taste is tooth decaying sweet apples.
Sporo było wypitego piwa swojego czasu. historyczna opinia i ocena z pamięci.
Pale golden body and no head. Sweet apple juice aroma. Low bitter and sour taste, sweet apple. fizzy carbonation. An average cider.
masterpiece. that's all. i can drink 6can of this amazing piece of art. this drink is not blong to the market. it should be at the fancy restaurant.
Can. Light golden color. Sweet aplles in aroma and taste with clove, cinnamon.
Drunk in Portugal, clear light yellow without a head, fresh but on the end heavy sweet, pour sugar,
Rami Rami is drinking a Somersby Apple Beer Drink by Carlsberg Polska at Przyłęk Duży Nie dosc, ze jak aromat liquidu do efajkow (znow!), to do tego chyba jeszcze wiecej…
W aromacie guma jabłkowa. W smaku słodkie, chemicznie jabłkowe, guma balonowa. Pijalność średnia, dość zamulające. Ogólnie nieco męczące
Clear yellow color without a head. Sweet apple juice aroma. Bitter and sour apple taste. Quite bad artificail taste.
0,33 l. Bottle from Interspar Zagreb. Yellow color. Apple juice aroma. Apple juice and sweet taste

Blik gekocht in de Poolse winkel, thuis geprobeerd met LiekevdV. Het is een helder goudgeel spul zonder schuim. Het heeft een appel achtige geur. De smaak is appelsap achtig, zoet en bruisend. Beetje "Spa en fruit" idee.
330ml can. Pours apple juice yellow. Aroma is sweet apple juice. Taste is heavy sweet, sugar, green apples. It’s ok, just too sweet.
Cider with apple juice color, clear aspect, soft body, medium sweetness, average carbonized, (drunk a 33cl bottle cider with PG at "Padaria do Soajo", Soajo, PT #863)(#9 DK).
12 ounce bottle, 3/13/19. Dark brown, large creamy tan head, moderate retention. Aroma of roast, chocolate, molasses, caramel. Taste is roast, coffee, chocolate, molasses. Medium bodied, chewy.

Clear straw color with short lived fizzy head. Aroma has sweet apple juice or soda, seems quite artificial. Taste follows quite sweet with bubblegum and apple candy flavors. Light, fizzy mouthfeel. It doesn't taste bad but it's more like soda than cider.
Can. Generally a sweet, carbonated apple juice, but not overly so. Didn't strike me as cloying like these 'macro' ciders often can be. No real depth or texture, but drinkable enough.
Sweeter than actual apple juice. Great offering from Carlsberg group. Slight chemical taste, but that's to be expected. Goes very quickly.

Süßliches Apfelaroma mit starker aber guter Carbonisierung. Starke, kurzlebige Schaumkrone. Goldgelb. Sehr süß und starker Apfelgeschmack. Man merkt den Cider kaum. Schmeckt wie leicht angegorene, süße Apfelschorle. Passt gut als leichte sommerliche Erfrischung am Abend.
Okoliczności nie pozwalały na zrobienie porządnych notatek, zapisałem tylko noty.
Green apple in aroma. Golden, clear without head. Green apple, fruity. Light body, high carbonation.
11.2 oz bottle.  Pours golden with some white head and nice bubbles.  Aroma is of fresh apples.  Body is medium, sweet.  Taste is of sweet apples and sugar.  Finish is long and sweet.  Sugary drink.

330ml bottle from Billa, drunk at home on a mild September afternoon. Pours clear with a buzz of fast-disappearing bubbles, no head or lacing, but persistent rising carbonation. Pale straw in colour. Aroma of sweet apple with perfume hints. In the mouth, medium carbonation, cloying sweetness, mild apple sourness, slight bitterness but masked by the sugar, strong ripe apple flavour with a touch of brown sugar and apricot with a medium-length sugar-laden finish. Overall, not terrible and actually quite tasty, but horribly sweet.
Flaska z billy. Vona pekna jablkova. Garba zlto zlatista bledsia. Chut jablko a sladkost.

7-11, Wuxing road. Sweet, artifical, dry but refreshing. I don't drink cider. But when I do it is because I have had too much beer. For that reason I don't mind the intense sweetness. Sure it is artificial...indeed akin to apple Tango. But for me it's a refreshing change. I couldn't drink more than two tho.
Bottle. Aromas: apple, sweet and too pure. Taste: too sweet, slightly spicy, green apple, do not forget to chill, no more.

330ml bottle from BWS, Queanbeyan. Golden colour, short-lived bubbly white foam head and fleshy green apple aroma. Taste is green apple flavour, some sugary sweetness, apple flesh. Light to medium bodied, soft carbonation, semi-dry finish. OK, abit artificial.
Doré, aucune mousse. Nez leger sucré, pomme verte artificielle. Gour leger pomme sucrée, aucune note cidre. Bref un jus de pomme leger, artificiel, un peu petillant
Solidan osvjezavajuci cider..okus jabuke i alkohola..nije lose,fino za popit..

L:
-pours a clear apple juice golden with a small to medium,quickly dissipating,foamy,grey head
-typical soda carbonation
S:
-apple,pear,sour,white wine
T:
-Follows the nose + sugar
-finishes dry
F:
-light bodied with typical, slightly harsh Soda carbonation
O:
More like a spiked apple juice than a Cider.
Clear golden, fizzy white head. Sweet green apple aroma and flavour. Not much character, a bit watery but an ok dryness in the finish.
Bottle. Very pale golden with a carbonation. Extremely sweet and extremely artificial tasting with its apple. It's overbearing in both respects.
Im Trunk nicht süß, eher herb, leicht sauer. Sehr perlig, spritzig. Im Aroma leider sehr künstlich, so massiv kann kein natürliches Getränk nach Apfel riechen.

Can from Colruyt. Clear pale yellow, fizzing, no head. Industrial aroma of apple juice, apple wine, sugar, cake. It tastes heavy sugary sweet, lots of apple juice, cloying into the finish until a very light tartness pops up. Light body, watery texture, fizzy carbonation. Nice soda, nothing more.
Aroma: sweet, apples and some candy. Taste: sweet, apples, some candy and a hint of alcohol. Quite refreshing, but nothing amazing.
Chemical taste. Overly sweet. Very far from what a real cider should be. Probably the worst cider in the world?

0,5 l can. Pours light golden with immediately dissipating frothy white head. Aroma of green apples, quite sweet. Taste is medium sweet. flavor apples. Body is light to medium, texture is thin and carbonation average. Aftertaste is more apples, but not so sweet. If it wasn't so sweet it could be refreshing.

Glass, 4-ounce, during the Festibière, savoured on June 10 2017; eye: straw, clear, no effervescence, no lacing; nose: apple, sugar; mouth: apple, sugar, finale in apple, light body, good carbonation, quite sweet, stick texture; overall: once is enough



FRANÇAIS


Verre, 4 onces, en fût, durant le Festibière, savourée le 10 juin 2017; œil : paille, limpide, pas d’effervescence, pas de dentelle; nez : pomme, sucre; bouche : pomme, sucre, finale en pomme, corps léger, bonne carbonatation, très sucrée, texture collante; en résumé : une fois, c’est assez

Zlatno zuta boja, veoma svijetlo. Skoro bez pjene. Aroma jabuke, jabukovog sirćeta i trule jabuke. Sladak okus, bez gorčine. Jake karbonizacije. Mislim da sajderima nije mjesto na ovom sajtu, ali dobro.
I was supriced to find ciders in this beer rating site, so this drink is related somehow to beer? Anyway, it is good refreshing drink for the summer. Apple aroma and sweet taste.
Prakticky tady přidávám tento komentář, jen aby tady něco bylo, protože zpětně dopisuji 900 piv z mého seznamu a asi bych se musel u toho zbláznit.

Tastes like some super sweet apple piss soda, aroma is fake as hell, so sweet that it’s hard to drink,  really artificial and overall I would say this is a marriage between water with a slight addition of beer and rehydrated apple-juice powder
Advisable for children  aged 9-11 yrs and everyone who only pretends to like beer so as not to be humiliated by their friends and classmates
70 Р. Не брать эту ссанину, которую якобы льёт Балтика по "лицензии". Ничего общего с заграничной версией, опробованной в Черногории, не имеет. Газированное пиво с привкусом яблочного сока.

500ml can. Pours a clear pale yellow with a thin, fizzy, short lived, white head that fully dissipates. Sweet fruity aroma and flavour of green apples and sugar. Light body with a sticky texture and lively carbonation. Cloying.

Not a sweet beer person. So this rating might be biased. Would love to taste a cider that didn't have so much of a wine cooler taste. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Backlog, ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji oraz przepisana z profilu na Untappd. To nie jest cydr
330 ml. bottle in Mae Kasa, Thailand. Pours a clear pale gold with minimal head. Aroma of sweet apple. Taste of sweet apple, a little artificial. A basic bottled cider.
A good but relatively light tasting cider. It is very drinkable and fresh, ideal for a sommer afternoon in the garden.

Dag 4 på slipp med Fridtjofe, og vi jobber på sprwng for å bli ferdige, men tid til en rating må vi ta oss. Klar lys gylden med kort skum. Dufter og smaker som billig, filtrert eplejuice. Mozell-feeling, en god tørstedrikk på soldekket før siste innsats med malerrullene, men heller ikke noe mer.

Can shared witj JMD on board Fridtjofen at Tau slipp og båtbyggeri 03.09.17. Clear pale golden. Diminishing white head. Aroma and taste of fresh apples, apple zest and wine gum. A hint of artificiality, with mouthfeel and aftertaste of artificial sweetenes. Not bad, though.
Bottle in Bremerhaven. Pours light Golden with little white head. Apple aroma and taste. Sweet.

This a great drink for the summer. If you enjoy a nice cider have a Somersby.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Draft at the blue lagoon in Iceland . A little overly sweet a macintosh tasting. Very drinkable to session

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

RBESG 2017, sampled on July 19, 2017.
At The Aussie Backpacker Pub, Riga. Pre-gathering.
From tap.
Clear apple color, white head with some lacing. Cloying sweet artificial apple ester taste. Apple aftertaste. Sweet, artificial apple ester scent. Medium mouthfeel, very low bitterness / tart finish.
2/3/2/3/4=1.4

21/07/2017 - 33cl can @ Pol? Pol? Gentse Feesten.
No idea about the appearance because I drink it from the can. Nose is sweet artificial apple. Taste is artificial apple, sweet ... Refreshing and not sticky but way too easy.

12 oz bottle from Tmoney99. Pours a clear pale yellow color with a few bubbles that disappeared quickly. The aroma and flavor have sweet apples, traditional apple cider character, honey, falls off toward the finish, very basic.

Bottle. Poured clear light amber color with a minimal head that diminished slowly with fair legs. Medium fruit sweet apple aroma. Medium body with a smooth texture and soft legs. Medium sweet apple flavor with a medium sweet finish of moderate duration. Soft drinkable beverage.

Pours clear light yellow with no head 
Aromas of artificial of apples, some apple mash, hints of wine
Taste has sweet winey notes of apples, pears, hints of green grape juice

Refrigerated 0.33 ml aluminum can poured into a glass. clear golden with small white head. Rich apple aroma, medium body, light carbonation, and little lacing. Taste is slightly rich apple with crisp finish.

Bottled. Very sweet, boring cider-like-drink. I would not call this cider, more like a lemonade. You might think it is going to taste like apples but then there comes the overwhelming sweetness. If Sprite was alcoholic it would be very close to this.
bottle 330 ml.. yellow color with infinitely small white head.. sweet apple.. light body
Gold, klar. Geruch nach grünem Apfel. Schmeckt nach herberer Apfelschorle. Nichts Besonderes. Schmeckt eher wie Apfelsaft als wie Cider.
Butelka 0,33l. Aromat słodkich jabłek. W smaku dość słodkie, wyczuwalny alkohol.

F: thin, white, quick gone.
C: straw, clear.
A: apple juice for kids, apples, sugar.
T: apples, sugar, hint of citrus, not hugely sweet, but clearly commercial from apple concentrate, medium body, medium to full carbonation, not bad for summer hot day, BB: 11/2017, 33cl bottle from Delhaize in Brussels.
Light taste, very good cider. Not a bad first cider for me, yet nothing particular to remember.

Sampled from 0.33 l can, best before July 2017. Clear, pale golden, no head. Sweetish, a little sourish, moderately fruity aroma of apple juice. Rather sweet, just minimally sourish, moderately fruity taste of apple juice, followed by a short, just slightly tart, a little dry finish. Thin body, slightly effervescent mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Quite refreshing, but it’s basically apple juice with alcohol.
IT is what it is, apple cider. Clear ale yellow, no foam, apple aroma and apple taste. Cider is not my thing. (Velp 201703)
Clear golden with no head. Aroma is sweet green apple. Taste is artificial apple sweetness. Reminds me also of the green Haribo apple rings. Mouthfeel is pure lemonade. Meh.
zo zoet als ranja, met een lichte appelsmaak. Zonde dat in commerciële kringen dit de norm is, want cider kan zo’n mooi product zijn.
Its really good. I like drinking low % alcohol and this apple cider is really good. Much better than another apple ciders Ive tried. And, of course apple cider is classic.

25cl bottle from Tops.
No head. Clear golden pour. Way too sweet. Artificial aftertaste.
Izlijeva svijetlo žuta bez pjene. Aromi jabuka, tragovi vina. Okus ima slatke vinske note jabuka, kruške, tragovi od zelenog soka od grožđa...HŽV
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer. Jako soczek ujdzie, choć sztuczne i strasznie słodkie.
Barwa słomkowa, klarowne. Piana rzadka, szybko znika. Nagazowanie jak w napoju. Aromat cydru, smak zresztą podobny. Smaczne, gasi pragnienie ale daleko temu do prawdziwego cydru.
Carbonated apple juice with some alcohol. It is still SOMEWHAT drinkable if served but you never look for it. Plastic taste and way too sweet.
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.
Pale yellow cider which tastes like a liquid artificial apple candy. Carbonation seems forced, like a soda. Not so pleasurable, perhaps should try it on the rocks next time.

Can from Seijo Ishi. Thin, lightly sweetish apple nose, with apple peels and a tiny wine-like note. Pale chardonnay color. Sweet apples, lightly metallic, artificial sweetener, and a bit cloying in the finish. Thin body, very low carbonation. Seems like an apple juice and cider blend.
Klares helles goldgelb mit wenig Schaum. Fruchtig, reichlich Apfel, sehr süß, spritzig.

2015 BJCP Category: C1A New World Cider


AROMA: Very sweet apple juice; almost sugary. Slight faux sour aroma (malic acid?). 8/12

APPEARANCE: Very clear shade of pale gold. No CO2 visible. 2/3

FLAVOR: High sweetness throughout; akin to apple juice. Almost no cider tartness or acidic character. Plenty of residual sugar. Sugary aftertaste. Palette seems authentic overall, but the lack of traditional cider characteristics is distracting. 12/20

MOUTHFEEL: Medium-light bodied; extremely low carbonation. Sugary sweet aftertaste is a tad cloying. 3/5

OVERALL IMPRESSION: This seems more like juice than cider; no indication that it’s going to be this sweet. Drinkable and enjoyable, but far from amazing. 6/10

TOTAL SCORE: 31/50

NOTE: I am a rank-pending BJCP judge. I am reviewing commercial beer to BJCP specs to hone my judging skills.
Cydr o aromacie ruskiego szampana. Wysycenie bardzo wysokie, nieprzyjemne. W smaku dominują kwaśne jabłka, w tle nieprzyjemna słodycz cukru.
bottle @ supermarket (győr) orange colour, lightly body, fizzy, apple aroma, sugar, very sweet, easy to drink

Uzupełnienie profilu

Średniej jakości cydr, trochę słodyczy, trochę kwasku. jabłko można wyczuć, orzeźwia
Overall not bad for a sommer drink if you like sweet sparkling apple juice. It is not much more.
(330ml bottle) Pours a clear pale yellow body. Aroma of apple and florals. Flavor of apple and pie crust.
A clear golden cider with a white disappearing head. Nice carbonation. The aroma is sweet with notes of apples. The taste is also sweet.

Storebought bottle.Very sweat cider (tastes more like a bad sparkling Apple Juice). Typical chemical apple flavour. Only recommended if you are into the taste of artificial Apples. Leaves a bad taste in the mouth
330 ml bottle. Very clear golden with greenish tint. Flavour of sweet apple juice and alcohol. High carbonation and an average to light body.

Server in a glass over ice with a lemon slices and a straw of all things.Flowery aroma. Low medium acid.No tannins/astringency. Sweet sweet sweet. Taste like an apple-flavoured hard candy.  Will not have again.

Bottle at Vera Groningen (Royal Headache). Pale straw. Straight from transparent bottle. Sweet apple, apple flavored candy, apple peels. Sweet. Under medium body, average carbonation, sweet and sticky apple juice that makes me more drunk! Hooray and show me your tickies!

From can. Pours a clear, pale yellow, fizzy head. Aroma has apples, cinnamon, vanilla, light yeast, rhubarb. Taste is more artificial. Fruity sour/sweet, dry finish. High carbonation and an average to light body. Drinkable and simple.
Tap, pours clear pale golden with visible fizzyness. Apple juice with fizzy soda (7up) and alcohol, that’s it really.

0.33l bottle from marktkauf/edeka.
pours a clear golden. aroma of sweet apples. flavour of sweet apple juice/granny smith with soda and alcohol, less of cider.

Butelka 400 ml. Pseudo cydr, pseudo piwo (55% piwa - 45% lemoniady). Oceniana wersja zawierała 4,5% ABV. Barwa słomkowa, w przezroczystej butelce, lekko hm jabłkowa. Bardzo słodkie, wysoko nasycone CO2. Pijalne.
Bottle from BWS 020516. Only brought this because we needed some cider for cooking. Very sweet and sickly, glad I didn’t drink the whole bottle.

This is not a beer. Get your priorities straight! Very clear golden with greenish tint, looks like apple juice. It foams but you can’t call it a head. Apple and pear, cabbage aroma, some other vegetables, vegetable soup, cardboard. Taste is horrible, like when I mix cheap vodka with a cheap fizzy apple drink. No finish. Awful drink.

Aromat zleżałych jabłek, pachnie jak napoje jabłkowe. Barwa słomkowa, klarowna. Piana biała szybko opadająca. W smaku słodkie jabłka. Wodniste, wysoko nagazowane. Dobrze pijalne. Data ważności butelki: 10.02.2017

Favorite beer of my friend. For summer nice. Pours golden clear color, medium head, has sweet apple aroma. fizzy. Even though its a beer version of the Cider its quite good when looking for something light, sweet and refreshing.
Bottle/can shared from memory. Pours pale yellow with a small fizzy white head. Aroma and taste is sugary, apple cider, floral.
330ml can from a 7-11 in Jincheng, Jinmen Island, Taiwan. Pours pale yellow gold. Aroma of apple sweets. Tastes of cardboard.
Gulbrun klar med lavt hvitt skum som fort forsvinner. Lukter eplesaft, juice. Søt smak, eple er der sammen med lime. Litt for søt.

Bottle 0.44
Российская лицензия от "Балтики"
Неплохой освежающий напиток.
Very sweet, fresh apple blast, very nice, would be great with some bbq food, slightly burnt

(can 50cl)
Aroma: artificial apple juice, hint of maltiness.
Appearance: pale gold color, clear.
Taste:Sweet,sugary apple juice with eurolager-like finish.
Palate:light body, medium to strong carbonation.
Overall: Overcarbonated apple juice.

Artificial apple taste, sweet, below average alcohol taste. Smells like concentrated apple juice. 

Overall, abit too artificial apple taste with some alcohol.
Sweet andere tasts like apples. That’s why so many people love it I guess. My favorite juice is with apples so it’s not bad.

33cl can at home (4 I 2016). Pale and clear golden coloured cider with vivid carbonation. The flavours are filled with apples, granny smith apple even and apple juice. The taste is nothing more, with a strong sugared and heavily carbonated palate. Man, this is sweet and soda-like! This cider really is not bad though, yet nothing what I look for in a cider. This is just a easily quenching apple soda with a hidden alcohol percentage.
Sweetish chemical apples. Not too deep, green apples with lots of sweetness. Round and fresh, sweetish and a bit artificial.

0,33l bottle. Good refreshment on a hot summer day.............................................

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Actually a pretty nice cider. Has a good green apple taste, a bit sugary. Sweet slight bitter aftertaste

Pours golden and clear. Nose is sweet applejuice. Taste is very sweet even though it says crisp. Carbonation is decent. Might be refreshing, could be a bit more dry for my taste. Thus way its Kind of Kids lemonade...
Very pale golden. Sweet and acidic apple flavour. Lacks of body and character. Perfect for a quick 7 Eleven drink in summer.

Fľaša 330 ml z Tesca. Svetlo žltá bublinková tekutina s jablkovou arómou. Sladká jablková chuť, ujde...

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle 400 ml. Hardly a beer, but it’s hard to deny that it’s tasty and refreshing. Allright as a warm-up.
Bottle @ home. Clear pale yellowish colour. Smells applejuice, sweet. Tastes applejuice, sweet. Okay I guess. Thin body, nice carbo.
Bottle @home tht 12-11-14. Clear yellow color. Smells and tastes sweet, apple juice, kinderchampagne with a bit alcohol.

Aroma of green, sour apples with a walnutty, alcoholic hint. Pours very clear pale golden liquid. Taste is very sweet and sour with a flavour of fresh, sour apples, no alcoholic taste whatsoever. Light body with a thin, fizzy texture. Feels and tastes very much like a soft drink, very drinkable and refreshing and the taste is nice and crisp, though it tastes more like apple juice than a cider.
Rather natural apple taste. Refreshing. Tastes like just apple juice. Only a little alcoholic feeling, although it is 4.5%. Careful.
Bottle, clear deep yellow color, aroma and flavor of freshly cut apples, medium sweetness and zesty sourness simple but very easy to drink and highly refreshing.

Bottle 0.33l from any supermarket in Belgrade Serbia you can find.Pour it clear white/yellow color with no head.Sparkling taste of sweet apple, bitter on the end, metallic in some parts.But all together not bad.
Can @ home. A clear golden cider with a white disappearing head. Nice carbonation. The aroma is sweet with notes of apples. The taste is also sweet.
330 ml bottle. Clear and yellow color. Medium sweetness, sour finish. Average carbonation.

bottled. quite typical in czech pubs these days. clear pale yellow with a shortlived head; plenty of carbonation; somewhat artificial, syruppy apple aroma; plenty of sweetness; a bit hard to get through a bottle
0,33 l bottle. Golden in the glass. Apple on the nose. Taste is apple, sweet apple. High carbonation. Nothing more.
Bottle. Extremely pale clear yellow color. Aroma of papery fruit. Taste is sickly sweet apples, metallic finish.
Bottle. Clear yellow golden with a small head. Aroma of pears, apples and lemon. Very sweet, very artificial flavors of apples and fruits nectar. Syrupy and not very pleasant.

Bottle sample. Clear very light yellowish with no head. Aroma of sweet red apple, sugary, some lemon notes. Very sweet flavor, red apple, sugary, syrupy, quite artificial, very sweet finish. Moderate carbonation, light-bodied.

Bouteille 33cl. 
Doré, pas de col et une fine mousse éparse.
Arôme fort centré sur une pomme sucrée le tout semblant presque surfait sans vraiment offrir le bouquet plus rustique de la pomme pressée.
Palais de pomme avec ce côté doux fermenté surfait tirant presque vers un léger mielleux. Le tout est sec avec une petite pointe caramélisée surtout au niveau résiduel. On sent bien là tout le côté industriel du cidre de masse. Fini est râpeux.
Best lekker, maar had iets meer sprankel mogen hebben. Erg zoet, beetje meer friszuur was leuk geweest.

Short-lived snowwhite head over crystal-clear golden cider. Apples, mainly (very) sweet, but also a by-aroma of rough applepeel. Bit of putty. Dryish, near-fizzy apple flavour. Sweet, but initially not quite as sweet as the nose suggested, but that sweetness gets stronger in the aftertaste - more’s the pity. Bit leafy. Light body, fruitsugar slickness. The base seems sound, but at least not fermented out enough.
Pale blonde color. Light aroma of green apples, tastes like sparkling apple juice.
Golden coloured with no head. Strange artificial apple aroma. Very sweet and artificial apple flavour. Quite siropy. (Bottle 33cl)
Bottle from Merkur Hoher Markt in Vienna. Pours very light gold with a very slight white head. Light apple aroma. Skin. Flavor has too much sugar and not enough apple skin.
Pale yellow cider which tastes like a liquid artificial apple candy. Carbonation seems forced, like a soda. Not so pleasurable, perhaps should try it on the rocks next time.
Tap. Clear, orange, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly sour, light body, sticky, fizzy, & long finish.
Een heel lekker appelbiertje, heel lekkere geur, wel geen schuim. Niet zo lekker als Newton of floris appel, maar wel heel lekker.
0,33l bottle. Yellow color with quickly disappearing white head. Aroma is apple, similar to apple juice. Taste is sweet with pronounced artificial apple notes. Overall it’s pretty bad cider.

Oh dear.
This is a cardboard replica of an average cider. It looks like it, smells of some kind of representation of apples and tastes of carbonated, watered down apple syrup.
There will be a certain market that likes this, but it isn’t a sector of the market I occupy. To be fair, I did finish it. Now, where’s my insulin needle?
Cannette 500 ml. 4.5%. Couleur jaune paille, claire, mousse mince. Arômes de pommes. En bouche, jus assez sucré, goût de pomme prononcé mais peu substile.
Bottled. Leftover from a veggie disj. Very pale yellow colour, no head at all. Sweet apple juice nose. Aroma is nothing but apple juice. Flavour is the same. Overly sweet.

To nie piwo w składzie ma piwo ale nic nie czuć tylko kwaśne jabłka, pod koniec czuć coś alkoholu ale czy to piwo to nie wiem. Dla kobiet idealne ja wolę coś co się nazywa piwo. Pozdrowienia dla fanów prawdziwego piwa;)
0.33l bottle. Clear golden color with almost no head. Aroma of sweet apple and bubblegum. Sweet and sour taste remains for some time.

Standard long neck, clear. Very pale and clear. Apple, Pl - doh aroma, lightly sweet. Sweet, but still crisp enough. Reminds me of gala apples. Very light astringency. Earthy apple aftertaste. Sweetness starts to cling. ABC Liquors, Bull Run.
Absolute waste of time with lots of sugar and some near apple aromas. Seems that this water has never seen an apple in its whole life. Absolute disappointment.

Bottle from local trinkgut. Pours out in a clear light golden colour with medium to sticky body. Aroma of sugar and ripe apples. Taste of sugar, caramel, leaves and apple juice. Sugary finish. Too sweet and unnice.
Yellow cider with a nice white foam. Strong sweet apple juice flavor. Very sweet apple juice flavor. Quite sugary.

Bottle@home
Appearance: clear yellow golden with fast shrinking head.
Aroma: apples.
Taste: sweet and fruity
Palate: refreshing, sour and light bittersweet finish, medium CO2.
Overall: ok.

Bottle, pours mostly clear with a gold tint, has a white head that quickly dissipates, has a sweet apple juice aroma, tastes sweet with a hint of tart to it, drinks smooth but seems a bit artificial to me

can. pours almost clear bright yellow with a collapsing small white cap, very bubble appearance. intense artificial pear aroma, sweet apple juice, plain sugars, little to no yeast, citric traces, not much else. agressive carbonation, light to medium body - oily and thick, almost syrupy, cloying and boring finish. DP.
Clear golden color, very thin head. Medium body, flat carbonation. Aroma of apple juice and sugar. Unbearably sweet taste. Metal in aftertaste.
Klar lys strågul farve med lyst skum som avtar raskt. Lukt av eple. Smak av eple. Søt og litt syrlig. Supermarked,
Can at home. I’m no cider drinker, but had this lying around so thought I would give it a shot. Tastes like cheap apple juice with loads of sugar and bubbles. Overly sweet and quite boring.
A favourite of my better half. Pours light yellow with good carbonation and a small white fizz. Aroma is tart apple and citric notes. Taste is much like apple juice with sweet citrus flavours added.
Bottled. Aroma has apple, citrus. Pale coloured cider with a thin, not lasting head. The taste is quite sweet, also in finish. Bit sticky mouthfeel. Makes it far from refreshing. Bad cider.

Wersja polska, zatem nie cydr, a "apple beer drink". Zapach: Jablkowy, winny, dosc slodki, lekki aromat lagerowy, lekki alkohol. Smak: Dominuja jablka z lekkim posmakiem piwnym i alkoholowym. Slodkie, ale jednoczesnie mocno kwasne.
bottle at a pub, poured a sparkling pale colour, sweet sugary soaked apples, weak hint of sour apples, refreshing taste. but meeh.... OK

500ml bottle- For someone who drinks nothing but cider, this is a disappointment! I’ve had draught pints of this and have loved them, but this bottled pint is awful!!

Way too sweet, yet somehow managed to be acidic at the same time! I managed to drink 1/2 a bottle but couldn’t touch another drop!! Why the difference between draught and bottle?! I thought bulmers fruit ciders were sweet, but this is something else!!
Bottle. Pale, light yellow color, small white head. Strong sweet smell of apple juice. Taste is sweet, apples, sugary.
Clear, .33cl bottle. Pale, light yellow color. No fizz. Aroma of fresh juice. Tastes of bottled apple juice. Added sugary presence. Its kinda tasty, not really a cider. More of an Alco- pop. (4002)

330ml bottle bought at Circle-K in Sheing Shui Centre.



Clear pale golden yellow colour; Razor-thin head and residual soapy white foam which fades in 5 seconds; No lacing with notable slight carbonation; Strong sweet smell of apple juice, oxidized + juiced apple fresh and sugar; Medium sweet taste of apple juice, faint alcohol, sugar, and hint of apple wine; Light body, watery palate; Mouth feel is near 100% macro apple juice of the faceless kind: no bite, almost no character, sweet, no tannic and go nowhere. The faint alcohol background is much more tolerable than its Pear Cider counterpart, but the apple wine hint reminds me this is a spiked apple juice. Damn… Wet after taste. Sweet and void to mouth.



Comments: How dare they put out this sub-standard, spiked apple juice to the public and call it a Cider and getting away with it for so many years! I guess the unsuspecting general public doesn’t care. Well, I do. Drinkable as an apple juice, hope you won’t fall for this scam. Never again!
0.33L bottle. Fizzy and over carbonated. Chemical Turkey apple bubble gum aroma. Sweet apple juice drink and baked apple flavors. Watery finish. Booring.
aroma of fresh apples. taste of sweet apple juice. sugar is very prominent and leaves a sickenly sweet aftertaste.
Clear golden hay colour, sour elstar smell mabey a bit to but the water was standing in my mouth, high carbonation, sweet sugar a bit oily afterwards not that much of a taste compared to the smell

Aroma is apples and a pervasive fruit perfume. The flavor is light apples, citrus and cloying sweetness in the finish. It wasn’t horrendous but based on the almost dozen ingredients, it didn’t help in the flavor really or was it "natural".
Smell is of fresh sweet apples. Taste is sweet leaning. Light carbonation but tart. Pretty good, I thought, on draft.
33cl bottle. Brutal sweet and too apple, very far from natural. I think it is sweeter than any Coca-Cola, yet it has less acid and other taste. Disgusting!
Not my thing. Drinkable, but just not for a long time. Apples and stuff there.
Definitely falls into the category of Meets Expectations.. Plus extra comments for the 75 characters...-- rated via 'Find A Beer' for Blackberry 10
Overly fizzy, overly sweet, overly sour. Like a bad version of Strongbow which itself is pretty gut-rot. Would not recommend unless you’re fourteen and can’t get used to beer.
33cl bottle. Light yellow colour. Smells of apples and taste like apples, chewing gum and sweet.

Not a beer, but tastes just like apple juice. Not bad if you like sweet drinks.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

It’s very refreshing. It has adequate head. It has alcohol. It’s something I can down a six pack in a sunny afternoon. BUT IT’S NOT BEER. My all fours rating doesn’t reflect my opinion of this superb product, just a protest against its listing here.

Tall can. Pours brilliant straw coloured. Nose of apple soda, taste is even sweeter than that -- MUCH sweeter. None of the defining characteristics of an English cider. This is ghastly, I was hoping to have a stretch without a rating this low but Somersby has succeeded in failing.
Can - very pale sweet apple aroma. Very light flavour, sweet pink lady like. Finish is sugary sweetness. Nice flavour but too sugary.
0,33l bottle. A clear golden cider with a white disappearing head. Nice carbonation. The aroma is sweet with notes of apples. The taste is also sweet.

Bottle from a supermarket, Ayia Napa, Cyprus. Clear pale yellow with a white head. Aroma is sweet, artificial apple, sugary and notes of Hubba Bubba apple flavored chewing gum. Flavor is quite sweet. Sweet finish. Sticky. 200913

Bottle. Pours a pale golden body, with no head. Faint apple aroma, heavy sweet taste, but more tastefull than other ciders. Thin bodied, average carbonation, watery texture. In my opinion, a sweet, but a very good cider.
Too sweet, doesn’t taste like cider. Cider is made from fermented apple juice, not corn starch and ethanol (despite what the marketing rules may allow)
Frisk duft av eple. Lys klar gyllen farge. Lite skum. God sprudlende fruktig smak av eple. Noe søt.

33 cl. bottle @ home. Procured from Carrefour. BBF 12/06/2014. Clear bottle. Lots of chemical stuff in the ingredient list. Poured into a big glass with ice cubes. Clear sparkling kid lemonade, insta-gone fizzy head. Smells basically like very sweet, white sugar, sweetened apple juice, Appletiser,… Sweet apple juice taste, odd somewhat bitter chemical sweeteners taste in the back, white sugar, more sweeteners, minerals, apple sweeteners, apple-flavoured soda, odd chemical sweetener aftertaste lingers on in the mouth, HFCS,… Cloying, sweeteners sticky body, crazy effervescent carbonation,… Could have been a good semi-aclopop, too bad about the persistent artificial sweeteners taste. Still not bad for an alcoholic white sugar etc. sweet apple juice soft drink. I prefer personally Appletiser.
Can. Clear yellow colour. Aroma sweet red apples. Taste quite well balanced sweet and sour, though a bit artificially sugary. Good simple commercial thirst quencher.
ciders arent supposed to have an ingredients list like that, but this is still a nice tasting refreshing cider thats better tasting than a lot of other stuff.
Plus chimique qu’autre chose, ça se dit cidre mais ça n’en est pas. Plutôt du jus de pommes avec du gaz carbonique et un peu d’alcool...

Tried this after reading about some ciders in local paper writeup and figured I need to reintroduce myself to ciders after a hiatus. Well after sampling several came to this. This is for the most part too sweet, no balance of dry, I have had better ciders.
Tastes just like a soft drink and doesn’t feel like a beer at all. Other than that it’s quite drinkable although a bit sweet. Overall not that bad.

330ml bottle (Rimi, Tallinn)

Pretty pale. Fizzy, no head. Thin apple-like aroma, some apple sauce, and pork, but that could be because I had to stretch my synapses so much to reach the apple. Thin fizzy palate. Totally sugary taste, just a hint of apple. An insult to cider. Fuck you Aldaris (looks like a .lv barcode). Shockingly drinkable, given how crap it is. Not a DP.

Very pale straw colour. Bubbly appearance. The aroma is pretty simple mixture of apples and pear. Sweet and simple with a bit of lingering sugary flavour. Very simple and not at all good. Has a sticky tooth-coatingly sweet finish. Ack. Cloying.

Bottled. Poured clear, light golden with nothing sticking around head-wise. The aroma picked up sweet and crisp apples with touches of wood and minerals.. definitely on the sweet side, but it smelled like it was going to be tasty. The flavor found sweet apples throughout, with not quite enough related tartness (thankfully there was some).. sweet apple juice and a bit of prickly carbonation on the refreshing finish.. again too sweet, but it went down quickly. Light-bodied with a good feel and flow on the palate.. very easy-drinkin’.

Very pale yellow colour.
Aroma is apple, not bad. Taste too, apple, any acidity, no sour, quite sweet.
It seems apple juice with gas, not a cider.
But at least the taste seems real apple juice, and not some shit chemical strong artificial aroma.
An easy and ok drink, maybe for girls, not for me.

bottle by my sister ( of all people ? ) in her car ( of all places? ) danish ( of all countries??? ) im shocked.. dont know if i misread or if its a diffrent bottle, but ABV and looks are the same as this ( brewed in sweden.. maybe its brewed in 2 places??? ) 

tastes like apples.. yeah, its a cider, what the hell did you expect? 
very young, green apples. sweet, no overkill on anything. no boozyness at all. carbonation is very nicely done. its drinkable, but again, as all ciders, a bit boring... i do like the aspect of appletaste that comes forward very good here...
Can, 33cl. Very artificial cider. Full of sugar, sweeteners and other chemical stuff. Very sweet, like candy. Not enjoyable.
Bottle. Seem to remember that was ok cider for a picnic, although too sweet for my taste.

500ml can. Light yellow, very clear. Fizzy white head that fades into nothingness. Nose is fruity and sweet. Taste is fruity - almost pear like fruitiness, a bit of appleskin, sweet with a slightly caramel sugariness. Finishes sweet, medium body, not too fizzy. Tastes like it was probably backsweetened and a little artificial. Overall, very mainstream product and I probably shouldn’t be liking it this much, but it drank very easily and I would have no problem drinking this again.
Bottle poured into glass. Hey sometimes you need to change it up. Had plenty of heavy beers that night and I needed to switch it up for a moment. It served it’s purpose.
Pours a sparkling golden.  Very effervescent. Smells like over ripe almost rotten apples.  Maybe vanilla too. Tastes like kids Apple juice. .fake.  Light and bubbly on the palate.  Pretty bad.
Celkem chutný cider, ale hrozně sladký.  Jen tak tak jsem vypil třetinku, další bych si nedal ani náhodou. Lahváč z tesca.

Golden with no head. Aroma is sweet apple, sugary, apple juice. Medium to full body- a bit thicker than I prefer for a standard cider. Super sweet apple juice. Not cider-like, just straight apple juice. Sugary sweet finish. Too thick and sweet to enjoy on a warm afternoon. One was enough for me. (Draught at Ric’s Country Kitchen, Bahrain)
Bottle. pale blonde. Sweet apple aroma and flavor. Sugary. Too sweet be be really refreshing.

330 ml can. E23522. BB 17/09/2013. Produced by Sinebrychoff, Kerava, Finland. (Prisma) Kuopio, Finland.

Clear pale golden colour with a tiny white head.
The aroma is apple, apple wine, some earth and mild sweetness. Rather dry though. The flavour is also quite dry with apple, apple wine, apple soda and some sugary sweetness. Rather drinkable (especially when compared to Somersby Pear Cider).

Bottle:
Medium sized lively and fairly quik settling down and than disappearing ashy white head. Leaves a headless clear yellow colored body.
Aromas of apple, sweet apples, some slight apple sour, dust, sweat, something light perry a like and herbs.
Flavours of sweet apples, a sprinkle of cinnamon, dirty maltish tones (overpowered by the sweetness), some herbs, apple peel and some green apples, apple sour and sweet candy
Sparkling apple juice with something malty and herby.
Very light and bit strange aftertaste is somewhat warm with herbs, vanilla and something woody with lots of apples...
Medium carbo, sparkling lively and light spicy mouthfeel, low to medium body and a watery texture.
Filtered, sweet and a bit unbalanced... Not my favorite kind of cider...
I really enjoyed this. It is refreshing with a strong apple flavor and alot of little fizzy bubbles. It’s mild, low alcohol and sweet. Sometimes just what I need.

Can from Tailgators, this cider pours very fizzy almost like a soda. Aroma of mainly apples, and pears. The taste is very syrupy and sweet, not much else to this cider. Rather lacking in any other department other than sweetness

Uncomplicated aroma of sweet apples. 
Light golden colour. 
Sweet apples, no artificial notes, but nothing exciting either. 
P: average. 
T: ok

Nice apply aroma. No hint of metal or artificial gunk. Apple juice pour. This is not as sweet as I expected nor very tart. There is a good dose of pear detected. Semi-dry finish. Has a subtle candy/gum flavor, but in a good way. Very, very pleasant to drink, and I will certainly have this again. Nice.

Pale yellow with a fizzy, non lace, quick disappearing white head. Smells and tastes like very sweet apple juice with a bit of perry. Light tartness on the nose. Candy. Light thin body with soft carbonation. You cannot taste the alcohol at all. Sweet, boring and artificial. It doesn’t taste like English cider at all.

My favorite drink in the world. Taste like sweet apple juice, but after a couple bottles you get a buzz - unlike plain old apple juice. Smells sweet, and tastes just as sweet. I am beyond excited it is now available (though limited) in the US. Does not taste like there is any alcohol content at all. Tastes like juice.
We have  a lovely daughter. She’s got her name after her mother. Passive-Agressive Bitch just turns 5 now...
Incipit not dry and not sweet just some stuff with aroma of apple peel. NIce foam and no aftetaste there.

[4973-20121127] Can. Peary apple juice sweetness in the aroma. Clear, light yellow orange body with a quick foamy white head. More sweet apple skins in the flavour. Light-medium body. Crisp and fun. (6/3/7/3/13) 3.2

(w/ jercraigs)

Soda water in appearance with frighteningly big and adhesive bubbles. Medium gold and bright. Strong note of berry and watermelon fruit roll-ups on the nose with just a touch - and I do mean a mere smidgeon - of apple pulp. Aggressively carbonated on the tip of the tongue, sickly sweet mid-palate and then drops of raspingly crisp. No body. The flavour is  just a repeat of the aroma, just heavier on the artificially candyish side. A hair’s breath above its Pear cider brother, but just not for me at all! (33cL can, 4.5% ABV, BB 24/06/13, Thirsty Camel, Butler)

Bottle 0,33l. Pours a dark straw color., Aroma of fruits and mainly apples. Same for taste but not too sweet. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

2012-11-27. Crisp yellow body, frothy white foam when poured dissipates. Sweet fruity apple aroma, like an apple Jolly Rancher dissolved in apple juice, nots of sweeter apple cider, very muted whispers of skins. 6+ Flavour is similar, quite sweet, quite fruity, strong apple flavour is a mix of apple juice and an artificial apple flavour (as noted on the can after I checked). Very smooth average plus palate is full bodied for a cider, soft carbonation. As a cider its okay at best, as an apple flavoured cocktail it is pretty tasty. I can only imagine the hangover would be massive though given the amount of sugar on the palate. Can from the LCBO, Toronto

I got paid 20 dollars or some bullshit to attend a focus group for this bullshit product.  I’m straight up rating this 12oz bottle in 3 sips, because that’s how it was intended to be drank.  Flat apple juice, jolly rancher apple sugar.  Seriously, fuck you Sweden, how dare you.  Completely for 12 year old girls to drink...and puke from the sugary disgusting artificial plastic nothingness.  Really bland, thin, one-d.  In no way enticing or worth an investment in.

Single can from the LCBO. Pours a very pale golden colour. The head is decent, kind of foamy and does last longer than most ciders. Beautiful fresh Granny Smith nose with hints of pears. Sweet tasting, but not too much, as in not syrupy, but with green and yellow apples. Just enough stickiness to not put his one watery. Pretty refreshing and tasty.

Nov 18 2012. 500ml can pours very pale straw with no head other than good carbonation. Aroma is just like apple juice. Flavour is not too sweet but no tart or sourness of Granny Smith apples. Just like an apple pop. No sign of alcohol other than slightly in mouthfeel. Very crisp palate. Too easy drinking for me.
An alright cider. Sweet and apply, average appearance. Not very complex but there’s some nice flavour there.
Can. Pours pale yellow and very fizzy. Light aroma of synthetic apples. Ditto taste. Not excruciatingly bad, but very far from cider, and not close to decent apples, either.

pours clear light golden yellow, minimal head, ringed retention, a few slow moving streams. Clean apple juice on the nose. Dense and rich apple juice flavour up front, mellow 6/10-sweetness, gentle effervescence, mild cloying, light tartness, sprite-like lemon/lime, ultra clean finish. Low-medium complexity, medium depth, great transitions, good carry, excellent drinkability.
Bottle from Mane Liquor. Tastes exactly like apple juice. Spot on! Sweet and summery

Can, pours a dark blonde, the aroma is fruity and apply. The flavour is really nice, its got lots of apples and it not too sweet. I could drink a bunch of this. Most ciders are too sweet, but this one is nice

Can: Poured a sparkling super yellow color cider. Aroma and taste are quite sweet with strong bubblyness factor. Not a lot of complexity and quite a lot of residual sugar. Easy drinking cider which doesn’t end up tasting like actual apple.

Barva: nazlátlý jablečný mošt. Pěna: řídká nedržící. Vůně: moštová příjemná. Chuť: osvěžující jemně nahořklý jablečný mošt. Pivo prakticky cítit nejde (vyjma oné lehké hořkosti) ale jinak výborný osvěžující nápoj do veder :-). Hodnoceno v rámci kategorie
Bottle. Pale clear yellow pour with no head. Lots of sweet apple in the aroma and taste. Palate is thin, and it could use a little more carbonation. Pretty tasty though.

Clear orange golden with a lot of bubbles. Aroma of sweet and sour apples. Always hard to rate a non beer. As a thirst quencher it?s quiet nice, although it’s a bit on the sweet side. You don?t have a clue this contains any alcohol.
Meh, this is straight up alcoholic apple juice, boredring on sickly sweet. Blech.

Pale yellow. Fake chemical aroma that continues with the taste. Lingering sugar on the palate. Too sweet. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

October 6, 2011 - on draught at The Charlotte Room.  What can I say?  Clear light yellow, bubbly, no head, smells and tastes of apple, maybe with a weird hint of vinegar, seltzer in the taste, overly carbonated and a touch sweet, very fast-finishing and not at all boozy.  Boring.
Can. Sweet, green apple juice aroma and flavour. Could barely detect the alcohol. Quite refreshing, better than the pear version but far for being a decent cider.

Bottle from a friend from Polen 

Bottle says Apple Beer .. same nam same alcohol same label so i geuss this is quite clearly the same beverage ... 


Head: pours some foam while pouring but then its gone ... 

Colour: kinda reminds me of cava/champagne/white wine 

Smell: sweet, apples, apple candy 

Taste: sweet apples and a tiny bit of acidity ... overall not bad but sweet and easy to drink
Bottle @ Herbergbrouwerij De Gouden Leeuw, Vessem. Pretty clear pale golden color, almost no head. Smell and taste apple, sweetness and sugar. Low body, low to medium carbo.
Nearly clear.  Very sweet with sugar, rather than only apple. Thin palate.  Very little to like here, but put it on ice, and it would probably be OK on a hot summer day.
Okay cider with a sweet aroma and a dry finish. Boring appearance. Refreshing on a hot summer day but way too sugary for my tastes.
Can. Pale golden colour with no head. Sweet apple aroma. Flavour is very sweet, apple.

A pale blonde cider with a thin big bubbled white head. In aroma, sweet apple sugar, browned apples, not bad. In mouth, Denis apple nectar with loads of sweet apple juice, lightly oily mouthfeel, faint alcohol. More like an apple pop. 500 ml from LCBO.
Fresh green apple aroma is sweet and crisp. Clear straw color. Taste is sweet and crisp. Overall ok, even if bit one-sided.

Not a big fan of industrial cider, but this one was nat that bad. Fresh aroma of green apples and some citrus. Taste is the same. Not too sweet as many of the other industrial ciders, which is good. Aftertaste is quite sour, but not too dominating. Good balance between the sourness and the sweetness. A very okey cider in my opinion.
330ml bottle. Clear golden color. Sweet, fizzy, apples in aroma. Very sweet, syrup, apples in flavor.

4.5% 500ml can. Golden + carbination. Smell is strongly freash apple after a few bit’s of mabye a green apple. Taste is freash apple,water and some sweetness from sugar. Really freash & good tastiing.
On tap @ Origin. Clear pale yellow with medium carbo. Sweet apple candy with no complexity. Not my kind of cider.
Average aroma, appearance, taste and palate. Decent, somewhat memorable. Rated in the past from the bottle.

500 ml can. Pours a clear gold apple juice color with little head that dissipates quickly though maintains good carbonation. Aroma just like apple juice. Taste is just like apple juice. No hint of alcohol - well hidden by the sweet apple taste. In summary, carbonated apple juice...

Bottle 0.33
Yellow color with tiny head that dissapears. Its ofcourse sweet and has taste of apple. It’s more than juice than a cider.

330 ml clear bottle, Cardinal Pub & Bar, Stavanger.ABV is 4.5%.  Pale golden colour, pours fizzy with a short-lived white head. Artificial and sugary "apple" aroma. Tastes like an alcopop full of artificial flavourings and sugar - which is indeed what this "cider" actually is. Avoid!
A light yellow pour has an initial sweet taste and a sour finish. It’s nice and refreshing on a hot summer day!
It’s a common bottle in supermarkets and some bars in Portugal. Lively carbonation and straight forward apple aroma. Sweetness is medium.

Can 500 ml 

Aroma:  quiet sweet cider, sugary green apple feel. Soft finish. 5-

Appearance:    bright golden with light white top. 3-

Body , Flavour , Palate and Final Notes:   mid light bodied. Sweet , clean carbonated apple drink. Alcohol almost non apparent. Refreshing for hot summer days. Bit too sweet.

500 ml can from LCBO.  Pours a clear pale golden colour with a decent-sized (especially for a cider) white head.  Aroma is sweet apple candy.  Taste is also ridiculously sweet and candyish - like apple juice with a few tablespoons of sugar mixed in.  Not my cup of tea.  And now I’m going to go brush my teeth before they rot.

Can 500ml @ home

Pours clear golden with a small fast diminishing head. Aroma has notes of green apples. Taste is medium sweet. Body is light, texture is thin, carbonation is soft to flat.

.33l bottle in Belgrade. Pretty popular around these parts this spring. Clear glass bottle, pale clean golden liquor inside. Some unfortunate mix of apple juices,  roasty and holiday spicy as i would think of a normal cider to be, are present. But aren’t very good. Not terribly refreshing, and I don’t understand the product on its own, but I’m sure it does the segment it aims for quite well. Yes, I could drink this again.
on tap at beertown in cambridge. nice light slightly tart drinkable cider. highly drinkable for a big commercial cider.
cooked vegetables, leaves, licorice, cheese, dough, herbs, citrus, bread, nuts, pale, cloudy, white foam, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly bitter, medium sourness, medium body, creamy, lively,

Bottle sample at a tasting at Dagan’s place. Thanks eyes_wide_shut. Pours pale yellow with lots of carbonation and no head, aroma of apples, apple skin, pear and nice sweetness, flavor of sweet apple, apple concentrate, zesty, light bodied, nice

ottle sample at a tasting at Dagan’s place. Thanks eyes_wide_shut. Pale, greenish-blond and clear, sweet, candy-apple aroma and sweet, concentrated flavor. Highly carbonated and a long sweet finish. Not my thing.

13/III/2012  33cl bottle @ home - BB: 16/III/12 (2012-232) 


Clear yellow cider, no head. Aroma: green tart apples, sweet apple juice. MF: lots of carbon, light body. Taste: sweet sugary, apple juice, fresh tart touch. Aftertaste: sweet apples, little tart. Ok, I’d choose it over a coke. But that’s about it.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Dagan’s place. Thanks eyes_wide_shut. Pale golden. Sweet aroma of green apples and sugar. Sweet sugary flavor with green apples. Light-bodied, slightly fizzy mouthfeel. Not good, but drinkable.
Bottle. Light yellow colour with a small bubbly white head. Sweet apple nose. Massive sweet apple flavour. Alcopop!
pale, clear, minimal head, white foam, citrus, bubblegum, light body, thin feel, lively, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly bitter,
0,33 l bottle. Clear golden with a short lived, white film. Apple candy on the nose. Sweet, artificial apple taste. Medium body. Syrupy and sticky. Light sickening

Bottle. Light bronze, almost no head. Very sweet and acidic aroma. Taste is too sweet for an apple cider - the level of sweetness was tolerable in their "pear cider" but this one becomes cloying. No dryness nor tartness, only sugar and citric acid.

Draught at Scot’s Corner. Very pale sparkling straw with only a modest and short lived head. Simple nose of apple juice and a bit of spice. Sweet and citric with good bitterness like apple skins. Very fruity and light. Light bodied, Spirtzy and effervescent. Long appley fruit finish. Good enough.

This cider I tried in Hungary. I already hate the day I tried it because I didn’t know that such bad quality cider exists at all. 
This is actually not a cider but water with sugar, some industrial alcohol as there is no fermentation I bet. It is the bottom of ciders, avoid it as far as possible. Its bottle is quite nice though and it is cheap.
Pale golden colour. Sweet, very slightly sour taste. Apple aroma. Dryish, light mouthfeel with modest carbonation. Light and refreshing drink.

I’d enjoy any good refreshing beer, but this somersby apple cider is beyond anything I had ever tasted....
the taste of the apples are just sizzling on my lips&tongue!

Also reminds me of Smirnoff Apple Ice, but without that small buzz.

A Great refreshing drink indeed....
it taste like apple juice so i dont think that i will drink this again ... for this price i can buy 2 litre different apple juice ...

0.33 l clear bottle which reveals its pale yellow body. Aroma of sweet apple juice. Fine sweetish, apple juice flavor, seems quite real and very slightly artificial. Nice longer sweet finish. Pleasant but way too simple and only a bit too sweet for my taste. However, it’s better than vast majority of commercial (non-French) ciders, so I can’t get low ratings. Do we have the same thing here?

Pours a lime-greenish body; aroma of apple juice and sugar. Taste is very sugary and dominated by concentrates: fake apples, loads of sweetening agents. Kinda fizzy. Vaguely more balanced than some of the other cheap cider’s I’ve tried recently, but all in all Somersby Apple Cider is another run-of-the-mill commercial cider which leaves me nothing but a sticky mouthfeel.

0.33l bottle, distributed by Carlsberg Croatia. Pale yellow body with steady streams of carbonation and a tiny white head that went away fast. Distinct appley nose, like apple juice. What the fuck... apple juice mixed with vodka, sweet, almost sticky, trace acidity near the end to give it some semblance of drinkability.  The ingredients list on this one says 30% apple wine (great, why is this on the site?) as the sole source of alcohol... I dread to think what that tastes like, if alcohol’s this bad in the heavily diluted version that is this "cider". Oh, it’s coloured by caramel too. Almost an epic fail, with the acidity saving it from that status. I mean, I’ve had cider of this type in Finland and Estonia and those were, if crap, quite drinkable and tasty for the aberrations that they are. This doesn’t manage to achieve even that. The only cider I can remember being worse than this is Blackthorn, which I overrated I guess. Ah, well.
33 cl can. Cleat yellow with white head. Flavour and aroma is very sweet   and apples.
apple aroma sweet,golden, clear, minimal head, heavy cloying sweetness, light body, oily feel, fizzy, short finish.

Can, 4.7%. Sweet apple soft drink aroma. Clear golden colour, no head. Sweet flavour, tastes like apple candy. Quite sweet, but somehow OK balanced. Better than expected, but gets extremely sweet after some sips.

Bottle 33 cl. Clear yellow with a bubbly dissipating white head. Aroma of apple and cinnamon. Medium body, very sweet and artificial apple notes - very sugary indeed. No apple acidity whatsoever. Even for a commercial cider this is pretty bad. 160909
Sodapop for the masses. The cider-generation breaks through these days. Hopefully they will not destroy our beerrevolution. But an okay thirstquencher for the first two sips.

Can at home.
Clear yellow coloured with a fast disappearing white head.
Sweet and artificial aroma of apple wine and apple juice.
Sweet flavour of apple juice and apples.
Sweet finish.
Can 0,5l. Pale golden colored. Head lasting a few seconds when poured from a distance. Aroma of sweet apple. Some carbonation. Flavor of real apple. A bit too sweet.
Bottle. Clear golden body with a lot of bubbles. Aroma and flavor of apples and some acidity. Not as sweet as feared. High carbonation and a long aftertaste.

Bottled. A light golden cider - very sparkling. The aroma is refreshing of green apples. The flavor is very sweet with strong notes of green apples with hints of wood in the finish, but the sweetness also stays and makes it a bit cloying - very simple, just a summer drink for the young.
Aroma is apple. Fully diminishing head. Orange body. Heavy sweet flavor, big notes of apple. Palate is light.
Clear golden of color with no head but a lot of bubbles. An aroma of apple juice and weak sourness. A flavor of apples juice and weak sour.

Bottle from an offlicence in Copenhagen train station, drank in the room with oh6gdx while waiting for Per to return. Apple juice soft drink, sweet, slightly artificial. Not a cider at all, some apple juice with alcohol added. Poor effort.

Free bottle at Copenhagen Airport Lounge
Pale blond color. Light aroma of green apples, tastes like sparkling apple juice (the one you can find in Switzerland). Low league.

can, 33cl.
appears clear light yellow, small head that quickly disappears.
apple aroma, no alc.
flavor is apple juice, but you can sense the alc somewhere. alc. well hidden. flavor is sweet "mature" apples. my first cider rating, prior to now i’ve mostly tasted low alc. cider.
basically and overall it tastes like sweet apple juice, with soda, and a hint of alc. looking forward to more ciders to enhance my sense of diversity.
Bottled. Pale yellow colour, no head. Aroma is apple juice. Flavour is the same. Very sweet in every way. Atleast it’s refreshing...
Can. Thanks to Papsoe for this refreshing gift. Nice - but somewhat weak, aroma of apples. Adequate sparkles and very nice light golden colour. Tastes nice.
Light golden, no head. Artificial fruity aroma of sweet apples. Flavourr is very sweet  and so is finish.

Bottle 33 cl. Pours a thin light spakling light yellow with no head. The nose is like authum-fallen well-done red garden-apples...smahed on the grass with bees humming around them....the taste is likewise the nose but also a little yeastie and with notes of pears and sugar with a (too?) sweet sweet sticky finish. Pretty straigjt forward - single stringed. Medium to high carbonation. The palate is sparkling and soda-like
Can. Pale golden / yellow colour with no head. Aroma is mature , apple, sugar. Flavour is mature apple, sugar. Thin cider.

Bottle @ Nibe Bryghus.

Pours pale golden with no head. Aroma has sweet green apples and a good dose of artificial sweetner. Medium carbonation, pretty thin mouthfeel. Flavour is a bit weird and unbalanced. Some apple peel, sugary sweeetness and quite a bit of stickiness. It is not terrible, but it sure is more of a soda-pop than a cider.
Can. No head. Color is very pale yellow. Aroma and taste are sweet apple with a light sourness.
Very pale, no head. Faint apple aroma. Okay while cold, but turns rather skunky when it gets warmer. Substandard macro swill.

Big white coarse unstable head quickly disappears entirely. Very pale yellow body with carbonation. Sugary apple aroma, somewhat artificial, but relatively clean. Very sweet artificial apple taste. Palate is sickly sweet. This is just way too sweet. Really a soft drink diluted with apple wine. Yuck. (0.5l can.)
Sweet and artificia. Light yellow and clear. Has a frothy white head, fully diminishing. Artificial fruit-aroma, chewinggum. Flavor is sweet. Texture is syrup.
Pale yellow colour with a fizzy fast disappearing white head. Aromas of fresh apples. sweet apple Fruity taste with a light dry and vague citric finish.
Canned. Smells a bit of baking yeast. Sweet with aromas of apples. Yeasty dryness. Medium bodied. medium to soft carbonation. Slightly sticky mouthfeel. Soft dry finish.

Pale yellow with no head. Aroma of applejuice and loads of suger. It ok refreshing, but the sweetness is definetly over the top for me, and when the acidity is lacking completly it kinda feels like sparkling applejuice rather than cider.
Bottle. Golden colour with virtually no head. Aroma is apple. Sweet flavor.

Can @ home.
Clear light to medium yellow color with a small, virtually none appearance, virtually none lacing, fully diminishing head. Aroma is moderate apple, apple rubbish. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration. (Syntetich apple sweet). Body is light to medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. (110508)

Can. It pours a very sparkling clear, pale yellow body, with the carbonation almost stopping after a few seconds. No sign of a head. Apples, a touch of yeast, loads of sugar and with a general artificial impression. Quite thin in the mouth, effervescent, and sticky sugary, leaving a thin layer of coating on your teeth. Apples, some yeast, white sugar and a little citric note in the flavor. Apples and sugar in the finish. Even though it’s this sweet and sticky, it still has some palate-cleansing qualities, guess that’s the apple-wine, but I’ll have a real cider instead of this one anytime. Didn’t finish the can. Maybe I rated it too high, but who cares. (080624)
Bottle 0.33 l. Pleasant apple aroma. Golden yellow colour - no head. Slightly sweet but in fine balance. absolutely drinkable.

Bottle. Light golden colour and no head. Aroma and taste of sweet synthetic apple juice. Too sweet and artificial. Unreal history thanks to commercials. Tastes a bit like the favorite danish ’crazy daisy’ youngster drink, Cult Shaker or the Carlsberg lookalike: Burn, just without alcohol.
33 cl bottle. Very ligth golden color, no head. Aroma is apple. Flavor is sweet apple, with some citric notes. Easy to drink, but not a real cider.
Can. Very light golden colour with no head. Very aromatic with notes of apple juice. Sweet apple flavour with high carbonation yet refreshing, but overall a very dull and artificial beverage.
